description: Several European nations as well as Canada and Japan detect the variant first reported in the UK.
title: Coronavirus: Cases of new variant appear worldwide
title_page: Coronavirus: Cases of new variant appear worldwide - BBC News
maintext: Switzerland identified three cases, two of which are known to be British citizens currently in the country. Switzerland is alone in Europe in keeping its ski slopes open to tourism over the Christmas and New Year period, and thousands of tourists from Britain have arrived in the last couple of weeks.
